welcome.heroTitle:
Keep track of your child
in crowded places
welcome.heroSubtitle: Scan the wristband, activate it in the app and get notified when someone scans the code. No tracking, works when it matters.
welcome.chip1: Make it easy for others to help you

consent.title: Permissions
consent.subtitle: For Avira to work correctly, we need access to location, camera and notifications. We only use your location when you activate a wristband or navigate to one.
consent.locationBody: Used only to show roughly where you are when using the app.
consent.cameraBody: Used to scan the QR code and activate the wristband.
consent.pushBody: Used to notify you when someone scans your child's wristband.

scan.title: Scan wristband
scan.subtitle: Hold the wristband QR code inside the frame.
scan.cameraPermissionNeeded: You need to allow camera access.
scan.errorAppNotReady: The app is not ready yet.
scan.modalActiveBody: You can see the online view as others see it when they scan the QR code.
scan.modalExpiredBody: You can buy a new wristband in the webshop.

settings.title: Settings
settings.notificationsSectionDescription: Control which messages you receive from Avira and your wristbands.
settings.systemDescription: Support, system info and important operational messages.
settings.wristbandDefaultDescription: Default for new wristbands. Can be overridden per wristband.

support.title: Support
support.description: Briefly describe what you need help with. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
support.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
support.throttled: You just sent a message. Please wait a moment and try again.
support.missingAppId: App ID is missing. Try restarting the app.
